alert.note: Alert for Assumption; St. James; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:52PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ascension, southwestern St. James, northeastern Terrebonne, northwestern Lafourche and Assumption Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Labadieville, or 8 miles southeast of Napoleonville, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Schriever, Gray, Paincourtville, Supreme, Labadieville, Bayou Cane, Belle Rose, Chackbay and Raceland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; St. James; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne; Western Ascension
